results.content: I learned a lot of things in building a great website. I am not a professional yet, but in this course, the basic techniques was introduced to me so that I am no longer taking some difficulty in developing the websites through node javascript.
results.content_html: I learned a lot of things in building a great website. I am not a professional yet, but in this course, the basic techniques was introduced to me so that I am no longer taking some difficulty in developing the websites through node javascript.

results.content: Lessons are divided in bite size chunks, letting you choose your own pace while learning. Theoretical parts are intersected with practical challenges that nicely compliment them. Last but not least, Q&A section is well maintained, and was source full of helpful topics during course. Learning Node with Sunlight as guide was pleasure!
